abstract: Profile of Minnesota State-Mankato center Assem Marei, who leads the NCAA Division II Northern Sun Intercollegiate Conference in scoring, rebounding and blocked shots; Marei expects to play basketball in Europe after graduation.
lead_paragraph: Assem Marei, a 6-foot-9 senior, would love to be the N.B.A.’s second Egyptian-born player, but he expects to play in Europe after his career at Division II Minnesota State-Mankato.

headline.main: In Division II, an Egyptian Center Makes a Name for Himself
headline.print_headline: In Division II, an Egyptian Center Makes a Name for Himself
headline.seo: Basketball Standout From Egypt Makes Impact at Minnesota State

snippet: Assem Marei, a 6-foot-9 senior, would love to be the N.B.A.’s second Egyptian-born player, but he expects to play in Europe after his career at Division II Minnesota State-Mankato.
